lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: I want others to have an opportunity to start a new life previously unavailable to them.
lender.occupational_info: I research environmental policies to ensure equitable distribution of responsibilities.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of adult literacy education.

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: It is a way to make a difference and support self-sufficiency and human pride and encourage a global community .
lender.occupational_info: currently looking for a job

lender.name: The Petersons
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with so much.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Cathi
lender.loan_because: This is an opportunity to directly help someone improve their life, and in a small way make the world a better place to live. I have always believed in the power of a small remedy.

lender.name: Sociology-Amundson
lender.loan_because: Our sociology class is investing with Kiva to learn about and participate in social change, social movements, social action, and micro-financing. This class project provides a global perspective to our studies.
lender.occupational_info: We are studying sociology, learning about society, social interaction, social organization, and social inequality.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: it's kind of fun

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I want the world I grow up in to still be a good place when I grow up. We have to start giving something back if we want anything to be left for my generation.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work yet, but I go to school everyday to learn and play. I love my family and my dog.

lender.name: Soledad
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact and my aim is to make a loan to someone in every country I've visited.

lender.name: Badi, Candace
lender.loan_because: Because I want to

lender.name: Wynne
lender.loan_because: I have struggled at times in my life, and have gotten help from friends. I'm now fortunate enough to be able to give a little back.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: karma is a bitch.
lender.occupational_info: I send people around the world on vacation, hopefully to learn something new about a culture they've never encountered. In doing so I believe we will all be better humans, compassionate, caring and understanding.

lender.name: Nancie
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small business on your own. Everyone needs a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for large corporations for many years, then I started my own business. Now I am retired.

lender.name: Hal & Tracy
lender.loan_because: We enjoy working as small business people. Giving others in other parts of the world a chance is very rewarding.

lender.name: Bert
lender.occupational_info: I help start businesses.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: My mother always told me to give back as I climb the ladder of success. She was right. I find it to be one of the greatest joys in life. I will do this as long as I am financially, physically and spiritually capable.
lender.occupational_info: doctor of medicine.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: The old saying about giving a fishing rod instead of a fish is the only solution for sustainable improvement.
lender.occupational_info: I create printed materials for an excellent university that serves U.S. and international students to make a better world.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Over the course of my career, I've visited countries all over the world including Congo, Kazakhstan and North Korea. I've seen devastating poverty first hand. I believe that microfinance loans can empower enterprising individuals to improve their situations and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the nuclear industry, packaging and transporting radioactive material around the world.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: It is the spirit of community, one of us helping the other that will bring us the change we want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people communicate their business to others.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I would like to help empower women to care for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am raising my babies.

lender.name: Tedfred
lender.loan_because: To aid those in need while being able to reloan the monies recieved
lender.occupational_info: Theatrical lighting designer. lighting plays for live audiences and teaching students how to do it.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have a Rock Band in the Colorado area. it's called Shallow Man Down. I believe that my voice can make changes in the world I live in. This is putting money where my mouth is.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: It's easy to make a buck. It's harder to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell real estate. What I buy makes me money. I share my profits.

lender.name: lola
lender.loan_because: regretfully I am withdrawing my Kiva lending as I feel Kiva no longer focuses on true MicroFinance which is my core interest.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: These funds were given to me by my father and mother in law. They were given as a "Gift of Giving". They've encouraged me to help make the world a better place for everyone, even if it's a little at a time. If I can help someone with this loan to better themselves and their family, to live happier and healthier, it would be a fantastic gift to me and to them.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant. I keep records for all sorts of companies; hospital, construction, architects, rental properties.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am able to. I am sure that most people in need much prefer assistance in helping themselves than simply receiving a charity hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: For 30 years I worked as a General Medical Practitioner in Dumfries in the south-west of Scotland.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I want to do something meaningful for others.
lender.occupational_info: I show others how to create art. I paint and draw and photograph different subject matter and most importantly, I raise my children.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: He who is kind to the poor lends to the Lord, and he will reward him for what he has done. Proverbs 19:17 God has blessed me abundantly!
lender.occupational_info: I help homeless people at a Christian shelter. I am a supervisor in the Women's Ministry. I also teach classes on finances at the shelter.

lender.name: Christi
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: office work

lender.name: Ernest
lender.loan_because: I have been helped many times and in turn wish to help others.

lender.name: Bonnie and Family
lender.loan_because: I would like to show my children how to help people in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are very excited about this opportunity to learn about people and places all over the world Google Earth is a great way to see the countries our entrepreneurs live.

lender.name: frances
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business with very little capital. I hope to help other women in need become more self reliant so that they can help their children and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: For the past ten years I have studied the Art & Science of Herbalism. I grow, harvest, process and create herbal remedies & nutritional products. It is one of my many "dreams come true".

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: The desire to do good.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I can afford a small amount to make a difference in someone's life, family and community.
lender.occupational_info: Student in college

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have a chance to be an entrepreneur, and make a better life for themselves. Sometimes they just need a little help to get things started in the right direction. I hope I can help with that process...

lender.name: Issa
lender.loan_because: Helping single mothers is what I do.
lender.occupational_info: I write about single parenting so that other single parents feel less alone, and so that people who aren't single parents will understand our unique strengths and challenges.

lender.name: Diane & Stephen
lender.loan_because: We are honored to assist others with an opportunity to help themselves & their families.

lender.name: Sue
lender.occupation: Life Coach, Breath Coach, Sexological Bodyworker,
lender.loan_because: it's a small effort that makes a BIG difference!
lender.occupational_info: I support people to make change and choices using mind body and spirit through a bodycentred life coaching style. I also offer somatic sex education through bodywork education.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference

lender.name: gayle
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I create consumer awareness and drive consumer purchase through marketing.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: giving helps us all grow

lender.name: Sam, Zac, Kathy & Steve
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe ending extreme poverty will alleviate many of the worlds other problems. Defeating poverty allows for better education which allows for a better person and so on...
lender.occupational_info: I work for a University by managing funds paid by students to purchase technology equipment such as computers and software.

lender.name: Sanjeev
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have had the opportunity to study up through post - grad, learning from great teacher's, personal experiences, and my family. Now I have a new opportunity, one which allows me to think more of others by creating new opportunities for hardworking people.
lender.occupational_info:
I've worked at a startup company in business development. My job was to help develop, implement, and market new products; as well as find ways to make the company more efficient.
Now I am in Sales and Marketing at a leading worldwide software companies.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want to help others if I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for newspapers and magazines.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and would like to reach out and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the health care field solving computer issues.

lender.name: Darci
lender.loan_because: Because when in a capable position it is my responsibility to help others who are less fortunate than me. The fact alone that they are trying to better themselves and their families makes me want to help them reach their worthy goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank giving new businesses loans to help improve their business.

lender.name: Conan
lender.loan_because: My Aunt Terry is a wonderful, thoughtful person.
lender.occupational_info: I carry pizza to tables. Then people eat it. Then, I clean their plates.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to Uganda and know what kinds of conditions people are living in and trying to get out of. Many of us in the USA live comfortably because of loans - student loans, car loans, mortgages, the list goes on and on. Thanks, Kiva, for all you are doing to make the world a better place!

lender.name: Sione
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to the point that I am able to... because if we all put out just a slight effort to help, the compounded results will be astounding.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just trying to do a bit more good than bad and "pay back" a little of all I've been given.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.loan_because: being able to help make a difference around the world is the best gift I've ever recieved.
lender.occupational_info: I work with documentation and compliance requirements for loans my bank makes to medium sized businesses here in the United States.

lender.name: BrandU
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurial independence can change the world.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I design buildings such as shops, houses, and schools.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Others helped me, I help you, and you go on to help others too, and so on.
lender.occupational_info: clinical research data

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Because I can and it is a little thing that could help a lot
lender.occupational_info: I write programs that tell computers what to do ... basically I am a problem solver

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: Everyone should. Rather than give your money to a "charity" where you are then cut off from your funds, with no knowledge of how they are used and distributed and never knowing who is truly benefiting from your contribution. Plus it is a hand up rather than a hand out. Give a man a fish or teach him to fish, I would choose to teach and empower rather than give and enslave.
lender.occupational_info: I remove, install, repair and maintain large industrial equipment used in the manufacture of copper building wire.

lender.name: Regen Family
lender.loan_because: We want to treat others as we want to be treated.
lender.occupational_info: We are working on the Gulf Coast of Mississippi

lender.name: Jody + Kevin
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I drive tractor trailer long-haul across Canada and US

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: Not ..., "Watt's in for Me" !
lender.occupational_info: co-worker at a Network Operation Centre of a small cable company for RTV, Internet and Phone

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I've spent a lot of money on stupid things in the past that never had an impact on someone's life. I figured it was time to make a change. I'm in business for myself and nothing matches the sense of freedom like owning your own business.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell consumer and business debt in the United States and work with the borrowers to arrange a fair payment plan so they can get back on their feet.

lender.name: Jim Buck (Oliver)
lender.loan_because: I feel it is time for the more fortunate of the global community to help the ones who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families through hard work and not through a government "hand-out."

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to not have enough to eat

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Because I have the means to do so.

lender.name: Darcy
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager for an engineering company

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: 100% of my money is going to the entrepreneur. This is not a handout, it is a hand up. I feel good about lending to someone who is working hard to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I taught elementary school for 31 years. Now I am a fiber artist.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I believe that by helping small businesses and entrepreneurs we can all make a contribution to the economic development of those places in the world where it is most needed and funding is virtually unavaliable.
lender.occupational_info: Liaison between United States Defense contractor and state and local legislative bodies (as well as other corporations, businesses and economic development organizations).

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women in business.

lender.name: Greysen
lender.loan_because: even the tiniest positive thing can have a huge impact on someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Native American tribe in Training and Development.

lender.name: Seamus
lender.loan_because: I believe that we need a more equal global distribution of wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an urban organic vegetable farm.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: $= POWER I want to give people the power over their lives.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: When I needed help others helped. God has blessed me with resources to help others and it feels so good to know a little money goes a long long way.

lender.name: Fatima
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and want to support the spirit of entrepreneurship worldwide
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to help protect the environment and all its resources

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because:
I feel everyone should have access to the tools and resources to live a better quality of life whether that is through education, food and/or the basic necessities for their family, a better home, or a stronger business which would help them and their community.
If my loan will help someone achieve their goals, then I will gladly assist them in whatever way I can.
It is our responsibility to help those less fortunate.
.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the financial records and bookkeeping for a digital printing company.

lender.name: MKMC
lender.loan_because: Because everyone who can, should.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I develop web applications that look very boring but are very useful to my customers.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: Everyone should help as they can because we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: i do medical research helping to improve everyone's lives in other ways

lender.name: Lorraine & Robert
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is a good feeling knowing you are helping someone in need.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I think that the idea of microcredit is brilliant! It shows how relatively small amounts of money can really change the lives of so many people. It is a wonderful feeling to be able to help someone who lives across the world and to know that whatever amount I am able to donate will really make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: i know how difficult it is to get enough capital to start your own business
lender.occupational_info: im a professional cook

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Nicole & Cam
lender.loan_because: we know how nice it is to have help starting a business :)
lender.occupational_info: we are just trying to nourish people, environment, and community the way it was intended... in balance and harmony with nature

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: there's really no reason not to. I like feeling like I can help someone better their life.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: Travel has made me aware of how fortunate I am. This is a simple and effective way to give something back

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian and Jesus said to share our blessings.

lender.name: Sally - Mpls. MN, USA
lender.loan_because: I owe my job of 24 years to a small business entrepreneur. I'm happy for the opportunity to help a budding entrepreneur better their own circumstances and their community in the process.
lender.occupational_info: Hire and coach employees that work for the business owner. Oversee all aspects of the employment relationship.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: This allows my money to help others looking to improve their lot and then allows my money to do it all again as it is repaid.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that have the initiative to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in massage and physical therapy. I get to help people daily who have injuries and diseases that impact the physical movement of their bodies. It's very rewarding work.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am co-owner of a web development company that provides tools for small to medium businesses such as myself.

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want other entrepreneurs to bring new and innovative ideas to the world market.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I work on crews that produce feature films, television shows and commercials.

lender.name: Shari-Lynn
lender.loan_because: I wanted a way to help people directly, not through a company that has high overhead.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events at companies, offering flu shots, cholesterol testing and blood pressure tests. I was involved in an accident and must work from home so this is a perfect position for me!

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help other people. These loans will help them achieve greater success now and in the future
lender.occupational_info: As an office manager I am responsible for making sure all orders to our customers and vendors are handled along with making sure all the bills are paid in a timely manner. I make sure any and all shipping is done and handle any and all issues that arise

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I love to help people get on their feet and thrive!
lender.occupational_info: I homeschool my children and we volunteer in the community. I also open the Bible and pray with women.

lender.name: Judy & Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make a positive impact for others in the world and encourage people to succeed.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I care. As a woman who started her own business, I know how hard it can be even in the best of circumstances. I want these women to realize their full potential, to achieve success and independence and to be able to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I feel very fortunate to be able to stay home wth my daughters right now. I hope to demonstrate to them that helping others is vital in achieving true happiness in life. Giving IS the gift. If we all work together, we CAN make this world a better, safer place for the next generation.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: Giving to others feels great!

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: it is the best thing i can do in my current situation
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor for animals

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: it is a way to express my gratitude for blessings

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that the small amount of money that I contribute can be added to other contributions to help improve the life of another person.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a seed and plant company and enjoy my work very much.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I loan because i can. It makes me feel good to help others in need.

lender.name: Scott & Kam
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to...

lender.name: Doug and Inmi
lender.loan_because: We loan because we have been blessed by the Lord and want to share the opportunity that He has given us to help our brothers and sisters around the world in need.

lender.name: Curt Shontz
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans help people to help themselves. It's really a no-brainer!
lender.occupational_info: I draw and paint pictures that help the reader of a story see with their eyes what the writer is describing with words.

lender.name: Marcella
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a great family, job, home, etc. and want to help others make their dreams become a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of the company permit and license requirements.

lender.name: Christiane
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled at the opportunity to help someone start a business and change their circumstances.

lender.name: Aye
lender.loan_because: The idea of these entrepeneurs taking an active role in changing their lives appeals to me. They're creating a better future for themselves and whoever else depends on them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an academic program manager in the San Francisco Bay Area. I help students in my program with class registration and nearly everything else related to their academic life. Since the program I manage is completely online, it's wonderful when we get students who live overseas and complete our program from their home country.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have family and friends who could and would support me if I needed help. I want to create opportunities for those who are without a financial lifeline.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Green Building Council, which has a mission "To transform the way buildings and communities are designed, built and operated, enabling an environmentally and socially responsible, healthy, and prosperous environment that improves the quality of life." I recently obtained a Master of City Planning degree.

lender.name: Frederick
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be born in Canada. I was lucky to be born in a good family. I was lucky to travel enough in this world to see that it is not everyone's case.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronic equipment for factories.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: We're all floating on the same giant boat.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major non-profit organization developing and supporting custom software. I hope I can give back and help those who need it, and that they, in turn, can help others. I hope we can all start a vicious cycle with non-vicious results.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Microlending is an awesome idea. I've had loans throughout my life to help me: car, school, and more.
lender.occupational_info: I manage retail for for an entertainment group.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: It's something I can do to help others that are far away to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big box store.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: We want to help make women around the world entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Many of us are teachers. We are all women with children and wish you a successful business.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I see an amazing amount of leverage in these loans!

lender.name: eline
lender.loan_because: To show the love of Christ

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: "Do the best you can, with what you have, from where you are"

lender.name: Magnus Wolfe Murray
lender.loan_because: I have learned that micro credit really works. Because I can have a direct link with the people accessing the loan, and they can see me and the other lenders. This is a great system. Everyone should use it.
lender.occupational_info: For 14 years I was a humanitarian aid worker, mostly working in conflict or post-disaster areas (Bosnia 92-98, Kosovo, Albania, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan, Eritrea, Burundi, Liberia, Indonesia, Maldives). In 2006 I decided to start a degree to learn about renewable energy and sustainable construction (because the aid sector rebuilds SO many houses but almost never uses these designs and technologies). Then I helped found an NGO to help spread this information. It's called RESET (renewable energy shelter environment training)

lender.name: Chau Nguyen
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: going to college to better myself and others

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I Work nights from 12am to 7am at a Gas Station..I'm a cashier and night manager..i make sure everything is ready for the next day of business.

lender.name: Alejandro
lender.loan_because: I believe that individual entrepreneurs in any country are the best contributors to economic development, thus I want to support them to promote global prosperity
lender.occupational_info: I train health care professionals in the treatment of pain and musculoskeletal problems using electroacupuncture and manual techniques

lender.name: Greenacarina
lender.loan_because: It is needed and I love to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a retail store 40 hours a week and do various work on the side to make ends meet

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Investing in the entrepreneurial spirit is the best way to improve the world.

lender.name: Gerard
lender.loan_because: I can make a big impact with a small loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Kiva!

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: Just lending a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: Classified

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to try and affect as many people as possible in as positive a way as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and I make jewelry for a living.

lender.name: Sherry and Family
lender.loan_because: I want to give an opportunity for others to better themselves and that of their family.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: I hope it can help motivate others to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: An impatient optimist working to fulfill a core belief that every life has equal value that every person gets the chance to live a healthy, productive life.

lender.name: Luana
lender.occupational_info: Work with Indigenous community groups

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: Its a sensible way for ordinary people to to help alleviate poverty by support ing people who want to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work in developing social benefits to peoples involved in environment protection

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupation: Retired. The photo is that of an inukshuk.
lender.loan_because: A good friend "invited" me to visit Kiva.org and make a loan. Also, I recalled that Muhammad Yunus won the Nobel Peace Prize in 2006 for his microloan project. I am impressed by the entrepeneurial spirit of the people, especially women, in developing nations. Although I have not put a great deal of new money into the program, I re-loan as soon as I have $25 in my account.
lender.occupational_info: I worry a lot about the plight of women worldwide, especially the atrocities visited upon them by the males of the species.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupation: Director of Marketing for Senior Retirement Center

lender.name: Nicole
lender.occupational_info: I do the morning milking of 150 +/- Holstein cows, take care of any health problems, feet trimming, etc. I also feed and look after calves, replacement heifers, and steers on the farm. In the process I operate tractors, loaders, and other equipment. I also raise and train dogs to help me with my work, they're very handy when I need to gather cattle from a pasture or sort and move cattle.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I see this as a way to make a real difference in the lives of people who are really trying to make "it" work.
lender.occupational_info: I am the senior priest in a church (Episcopal/ Anglican) in Savannah, Georgia USA.

lender.name: Julie & James
lender.occupation: Clinical Research Assoc. / Service Trng Coord.
lender.loan_because: It always feels better to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: Jet-setter/road warrior

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is the best way to improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: I perform maintenance and repair of helicopters, own gift store and conduct meetings of self awareness and improvement /developement

lender.name: boby
lender.loan_because: i want to help

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. My family and I enjoy a good life and we would like to share this with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I design the lighting of new construction projects, and the re-imaging of established developments.

lender.name: Carolina & Marco
lender.loan_because: We believe that big changes start with small steps.

lender.name: Harper and Cleo
lender.loan_because: We can and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Sleeping, eating, barking, and playing.

lender.name: Sara & Eric
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I am in college and work for NASA playing with money all day. It sounds much more exciting than it really is. :)

lender.name: Monelle
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege and a pleasure to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day, working for my daughter's wholesale costume jewelry business.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Empowering others to better the lives of their familys makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies unlock their hidden potential.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I love helping people!

lender.name: Veronica
lender.occupation: Project Coordinator for a CBSM company

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I love knowing I can give a hand up to someone working hard to start thier own business! I know what a challenge it was to start mine.
lender.occupational_info: I help people of all walks of life to get the shelter that they need. Whether it is buying or renting, or helping the homeless, there is a way to make a match!

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I need to believe they would do the same for me if roles were reversed. Also, because it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I believe empowerment isn't just life-altering, but world-changing.
lender.occupational_info: I create loan documents for a bank. I am also working on a Masters degree in International Business, and I am a professional photographer on the side.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I want to see what kind of an impact I can have.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the energy industry managing a program that provides services to commercial customers.

lender.name: Nedra & kids
lender.loan_because: of my desire to be charitable on a global level and instill hope in those who seek to better themselves. Basically, to show the love of Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the business of educating children.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: Love to help

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I need to help other people.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I feel like I have had a most fortunate life, and I would like to help someone have a better life. We should all be able to live and work and make positive contributions to the world. I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of 6 year old children. Living in California, I typically have a classroom with 20 children during the school year.

lender.name: Megan
lender.occupational_info: I go and I learn about things...

lender.name: Vijay Medithi
lender.loan_because: It contributes in a minute way to empower others to work towards their financial freedom. And the transparency is unparalell.

lender.name: Kathi and Terry
lender.loan_because: We had been looking for a long time to find something we could do to share our good fortune. Kiva was just the answer and we're excited to be able to start sharing in this venture.
lender.occupational_info: Kathi is a teacher. She teaches music to elementary school children. She has taught music to children in Australia, Africa, and Japan. She is also an assistant director for the local children's choir. Terry is an instructional aide at the local community college and is also a freelance graphic designer. He is also an aspiring writer.

lender.name: Ana e Carlos
lender.loan_because: We are all in the same boat

lender.name: KEVIN CARROLL
lender.loan_because: "to whom much is given, much is expected"
lender.occupational_info: Author, Speaker, and an Agent for social Change

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and know how hard it is to start up a new business. If I can help someone get started and make their dreams come true to provide for themselves and their families, its my small way to assist.
lender.occupational_info: I am a co-owner of a gourmet cookie and brownie gift company. We ship our products all over the US. Our job is to send a smile in a box. :-)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to lIve in the United States. How did that happen and why?
lender.occupational_info: I train maintenance people who work on high technology sorting machines for the United States Postal Service

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people...
lender.occupational_info: I manage commercial construction projects...

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I like to help people, to change their situation themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people develope their internet buisness.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: When God blesses us with plenty, he expects us to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I do volunteer work for various community agencies, including teaching English to refugees.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: I have so much. I enjoy being able to help others.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Altruism is not solely a domain of the religious.
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to understand and discover things and then explain them to other people, who use that knowledge to save lives.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone should have an equal amount of fun and enjoyment in their life. I know a lot of people work hard for it and it's fun for me to be able to help them achieve!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and participate in athletics and other clubs and organizations!

lender.name: Kyle & Sara
lender.loan_because: Everyone is worthy.
lender.occupational_info: Sara is a wedding and event planner, so she gets to help people celebrate different events in their lives with people they love. Kyle works for a local church and is resposible for creating and running services using modern, creative methods to meet seekers where they are.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Latifa-Therese
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me in times of trouble
lender.occupational_info: helping families in crisis

lender.name: Kari-Lynn
lender.occupational_info: I study economics at the University of Chicago.

lender.name: Michael & Vivian
lender.loan_because: We are inspired by those who strive to make their lives better by working hard.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because:
I believe in personal empowerment. Once a loan is repaid, the money can be applied to another lender, creating a sustainable cycle.
As a freelance artist, I have been given opportunities that allowed me to realize my dream. I want to help create opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work independently as a painter. My goal is to make a living doing what I love and inspire others to do the same!

lender.name: Gerry & Heather
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe we should share our good fortune with others. And it is good Karma.
lender.occupational_info: Gerry is a resident manager, he manages a town house complex of 35 townhouses in Brisbane.

lender.name: karren
lender.loan_because: These are real people with strength of character (not companies that only exist on paper) dealing in real commodities and services - unlike the imaginary world of investment, hedge funds, and banking firms. The return is greater than any "blue chip" stock could ever produce.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: i am already in debt anyway!

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I really have nothing better to do with my money.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: i got too much cash

lender.name: Aisha
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: We can all make a difference, one person at a time. I'm just grateful for what I have and trying to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a New York State government office that maintains New York State highways.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I design and support programs to help people be more effective at their jobs.

lender.name: Amanda & Nick
lender.loan_because:
We loan because we believe in supporting women entrepreneurs.
"To give without any reward, or any notice, has a special quality of its own." - Anne Morrow Lindbergh, Writer & Aviation Pioneer
lender.occupational_info: Nick is studying to be a Dentist, and Amanda works in Sales.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: As cliche as it sounds, I want to make a difference in the world and feel like this gets my $$ to the people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 11 and 12 year olds math and science.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: It is truly a wonderful way for an average person with an average income to make a huge difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: With a special machine and using a form of shorthand, I take down every word that is said in a courtroom.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise my 3 children.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference. When I needed help I had family there. Now I can give back. I prefer to lend to widows in honor of my own mother who helps so many.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have been hurt by others.

lender.name: Matt & Debra
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and like to give so that others may have the same comforts we enjoy.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: It feels GREAT to be able to help out others!!

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Its time I try to give back to others. Expecially from a country that shown me such a wonderful wife.
lender.occupational_info: Before damaging my back, I was 15 years in Network development.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.occupational_info: I use technology to make better use of business resources. This helps the business save money.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: The world is only one great family to which we all belong
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults who have had brain injuries and strokes and can no longer speak , think, or swallow normally.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It's this little things that we do one at a time that will eventually add up and change the world to be a better place to live.
lender.occupational_info:
I strongly believe in communal spirit and that We all need each other in one way or another.
It's by embracing such a spirit of togetherness that undeveloped and struggling individuals can be able to pull resources together and be able to overcome.
You can read more about our Nikenya community by following the link below:

lender.name: Fernando Guzman
lender.loan_because: Because I believe
lender.occupational_info: IT and internet entrepreneur

lender.name: Akemi
lender.loan_because: I believe that people all over the world should be able to stand on their own 2 feet.
lender.occupational_info: Unchallenging and non-gratifying (I need a new job!)

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for God's blessings, and as humble as my offerings may be, I am hopeful that they will have a positive impact on the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in independent new business development consultant

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to build their lives, homes, and businesses, and live independently, with dignity and purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I work in environmental labs where we test water, soil, and air samples.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. I believe that people who can contribute to their own success will be happier and more successful
lender.occupational_info: I build computer database systems for small business

lender.name: Chona
lender.loan_because: Passing on the blessings

lender.name: mona
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance that probably would have no opportunity otherwise to support themselves and their children
lender.occupational_info: Me and my husband build homes

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I create new ways for organizations to promote their business.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am helping to empower people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a city transit bus.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have plenty. Its time to give back.

lender.name: Jonathan & Stacey
lender.loan_because: We want to play our part in meeting the UN's Millennium Development Goals - ending poverty by 2015 (www.endpoverty2015.org)
lender.occupational_info: We hope our work in science education and environmental protection makes our wonderful planet an even better place to call HOME

lender.name: kmcnab
lender.loan_because: i want to
lender.occupational_info: I design communications systems for buildings and manage the installation

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: "So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you,..." Matt 7:12
lender.occupational_info: I started my own business selling advertising space in, and publishing a real estate magazine.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Those who can, should. If we all help a little the world will be a better place

lender.name: marc
lender.occupational_info: I study water quality

lender.name: KENNETH
lender.loan_because: I Believe In The In The Law of Reciprocity ..In Giving So Shall You Recieve!

lender.name: Dominique & Dave
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make their life better.

lender.name: Ruy
lender.loan_because: it is a simple way to have a positive impact on these communities
lender.occupational_info: I work for US Bank in London as researcher.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to me.
lender.occupational_info: Doctor for children

lender.name: Millard
lender.loan_because: We are our brother's and sister's keeper. It feels good to share our resources and labor with one another. I admire the people requesting loans and enjoy reading their stories to create a business or service to help their families.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It's fun. It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and service corporate jet aircraft at Los Angeles International Airport

lender.name: dealegn
lender.loan_because: to open my owen small busines:to grow onion and export localy
lender.occupational_info: i am agrnomist and it means plant gardener

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to help people fulfill their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I make websites and help people to achieve goals using internet.

lender.name: Sigrun
lender.loan_because: It's remarkable to have this opportunity to directly help someone help him/herself. A wise man said: Bad things happen because good people stand by and do nothing. This way, I'm not doing nothing. I am putting my grain of sand on the balance.
lender.occupational_info: I study journalism at the university of Iceland. Freelance journalist as well.

lender.name: Katherine and Adrian
lender.loan_because: It makes the world go round.
lender.occupational_info: London, England

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupation: Business Consulting and Product Export Services
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to become financially independent. Especially people who have had a hard time getting things started or for those that need some help getting the tools they need to make their business successful, as I know what it is like to start from nothing or live from pay check to pay check. I wish them the best of luck and if I can help out a little and make the world a better place, why not.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish to eat and he can last another day. Teach a man to fish and he can last forever. It just makes sense to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach a high school e-commerce class in Bnghamton, NY They sell their own personal items on EBAY for profit. I am asking them to donate 10% of their profits to Kiva.

lender.name: $OLUCAO

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses with their computer systems and the Internet.

lender.name: rabbitinwriting.co.uk
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference to the lives of these people. I am helping people who are trying to help themselves. It doesn't cost me anything!
lender.occupational_info: fun, not the success we had hoped,

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that my money is helping others to build a better life for themselves and their community.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to help make someone's life a little easier if I can

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate of New York University's Gallatin School of Individualized Study. I currently run a nonprofit charity called The LeVine Foundation that works in the areas of health, poverty, development, and the environment.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: to share with others to help improve lives. It takes so little to help so much.

lender.name: Tiffany

lender.occupational_info: Imagine a symphony conductor, but substitute the instruments with computers.

lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility to help if we have the ability!
lender.occupational_info: I help the people in my company help clients manage their finances.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: It helps real people in real ways.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Giving feels super good, and these people have clearly paid their dues so why not help them with the last step?
